episode: We recently had a bad storm in our area that caused widespread, prolonged power outages. I felt disgusted by the whole situation.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: We recently had a bad storm in our area that caused widespread, prolonged power outages. I felt disgusted by the whole situation.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That sounds awful. What was the worst part of it for you?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: The worst part of it was throwing out over $150 worth of groceries due to the power being out for over a week. I was also disgusted by the lack of urgency by city leaders and power companies.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's infuriating. Losing all that food must have been frustrating, and the slow response from officials didn't help.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: And to add insult to injury, I applied for federal assistance and was denied!

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's ridiculous. You'd think they'd have some compassion after all you went through.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yes, I was upset. Cleaning out the fridge was disgusting as well. There was rotting food everywhere.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Ugh, that's nasty. I can imagine the smell was awful too.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It was! We tried to use ice but it would melt and get the fridge all wet. I didn't want the fridge to break.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Smart thinking. Last thing you needed was a broken fridge on top of everything else.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yeah, I didn't want to make things worse considering. I just bit the bullet so to speak.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Sometimes you just gotta suck it up and deal with the mess.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yeah but in this instance I thought some help from someone would be in order.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: You'd think so, especially after going through all that.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Lots of people were hurting. It was a "derecho". Have you heard of it

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Yeah, I've heard of derechos. They're like super intense storms that cause a lot of damage.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yes, the wind was intense. I've never experienced anything like it and I have experienced hurricanes!

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Whoa, that's saying something! Hurricanes are no joke, so a derecho must've been really crazy.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I had to drive home in it. Thankfully I made it through ok.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That was a close call! Glad you made it home safely.
